To register as an alumni, click on **Register** in the top menu and fill your details.
Go to the Register page and choose whether you are an Alumni or Student.
You can login by clicking the **Login** button on the top right corner.
Make sure you select the correct role: Student / Alumni / Admin.
You can find all **Latest Notices** on the right sidebar of the website.
Check the Notices section → Click on any notice to view or download the PDF.
Alumni regularly post **job openings** in the Career Hub. Students can view them on the dashboard.
Check the **Latest Job Openings** section in your dashboard.
Admins can be contacted via their registered email addresses. Visit the **Admin Dashboard / Contacts** page.
You can reach the admin by checking the Admin details in the system.
Yes! 🎉 Several VIT Chennai alumni are working at Google as Software Engineers and Data Scientists.
Our alumni are placed in Google Bangalore, Hyderabad, and even Mountain View, USA.
Yes! Many alumni are working in Microsoft as SDEs, Program Managers, and Cloud Engineers.
Microsoft has hired multiple VIT Chennai graduates over the years.
VIT Chennai Campus is located at Vandalur–Kelambakkam Road, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India.
📍 Address: VIT Chennai, Vandalur–Kelambakkam Road, Chennai - 600127.
We are building a Mentor-Mentee Matching system 🔗 where alumni can mentor students based on interests, location, and industry.
Students can request mentorship via the platform, and alumni can accept to guide them.
Alumni can donate through the **Donations** page. Contributions go to scholarships, events, and student support.
Visit the Donations section for secure payment and support options.
The **Alumni Meet 2025** is scheduled for Jan 15th 🎉. Check the Notices section for the invitation PDF.
We organize alumni meets, webinars, and reunions regularly. Stay tuned to the Events page.
